location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 82 from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident at Bushire to William Newnham, Chief Secretary to Government, Political Department, Bombay

mods.abstract: Letter reporting that Shaikh Nassir [Nasir] son of Abdool Rusool Khan [‘Abd al-Rasūl Khān], had along with his uncle Shaikh Hussein [Ḥusayn] taken refuge at the Residency and discussing the offers and pledges made to them by the current Governor of Bushire, Shaikh Ahmed [Aḥmad].The letter continues by reporting that a Firman had been received formally confirming Shaikh Ahmed as the Governor of Bushire, and that following receipt of this he had congratulated the new Governor and given him the customary presents.
